name: Simulation Training Room: Massacre
description:
What Is This Game?

The simulation training room is a secret base. At here you can connects to the virtual world and kills zombies to gain experience and upgrades.
After each connection to the virtual world, you have an hour for keep connect.
Over time, the zombies will become stronger, and the dropped items will also be different.

Playing Method

Select a virtual scene and connect to it.
Killing zombies increases level, and after upgrading, skill points can be allocated within the base to become more powerful.
The longer the virtual scene takes, the higher the probability of obtaining spoils of war.(It will be presented within the secret base)

Fee

This game is completely free and without any internal purchases. You will experience the complete game.
